Staggering Staff.name: Staggering Staff
Staggering Staff.flavor: Your staff whirls in your hands, and your enemy stumbles into just the right place.
Staggering Staff.trigger: You miss an enemy with a melee attack using a staff

Reaping Axe.name: Reaping Axe
Reaping Axe.flavor: You strike with such force that even a glancing blow is felt by your enemy.
Reaping Axe.trigger: You miss an enemy with a melee attack using an axe.
Reaping Axe.effect: The target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Serpentine Blade.name: Serpentine Blade
Serpentine Blade.flavor: Even when a foe avoids your attack, you seize the advantage.
Serpentine Blade.trigger: You miss an enemy with a melee attack using a heavy blade.
Serpentine Blade.effect: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn or until you or one of your allies attacks it.
